item.title: Taming your pet snake!
item.description: Learn how to build trust and gently tame your pet snake like a pro!

media:content.media:title: Taming your pet snake!
media:content.media:description: Learn how to build trust and gently tame your pet snake like a pro!

item.title: Let's search for a hatchling!
item.description: Time to dig in and see if we can find a brand-new hatchling!

item.title: Shipping out more snakes!
item.description: Another batch of beautiful snakes heads out to their new homes!

item.title: Do we have eggs yet?
item.description: Checking on my snakes to see if it’s finally egg-laying time!

item.title: Refresh Enclosure!
item.description: Giving my snakes’ enclosure a fresh new setup. Clean, cozy, and ready for them to explore!

item.title: What happens when my snakes lay eggs?
item.description: Watch the incredible moment my snakes lay their eggs and see what happens next!

item.title: Woah! Jinx is a big girl, but such a sweetheart!
item.description: Meet Jinx, a big girl with an even bigger heart!

item.title: My mom always told me to stay away from bad eggs!
item.description: Why you should always listen to your mom’s advice about “bad eggs”!

item.title: Let's cut it open and see what’s inside!
item.description: A hands-on look as we cut it open to reveal the surprising inside!

item.title: I hope we don't lose that egg!
item.description: Holding our breath as we try to save one precious egg from the clutch!

item.title: We got a new species!
item.description: Meet our exciting new addition, a species we’ve never had before!

item.title: This was one of the coolest snakes I’ve ever seen!
item.description: An unforgettable encounter with one of the most unique snakes I’ve ever come across!

item.title: AMAZING FOOTAGE! Our snake is laying eggs right now!
item.description: Incredible moment caught on camera, watch our snake lay her eggs in real time!

item.title: Pinstripes galore!
item.description: A showcase full of sleek and stunning pinstripe patterns!

item.title: If the specimen begins to look dingy, simply empty and refill.
item.description: A quick tip on keeping your specimen fresh by just emptying and refilling when it starts to look dingy.

item.title: Egg teeth are found on oviparous animals (animals that hatch from eggs), including birds, reptiles, and even some mammals (monotremes)!
item.description: Discover how egg teeth help birds, reptiles, and even monotremes break free from their shells!

item.title: To cut or not to cut?
item.description: A tough decision unfolds as we debate whether or not to cut the snake egg!

item.title: Sometimes bad things happen!
item.description: A reminder that life isn’t always perfect!

item.title: This clutch caught me a little off guard!
item.description: Watch as an unexpected clutch of eggs brings a surprising twist to the breeding season!

item.title: Banana Mystic potion!
item.description: A stunning look at the unique beauty of the Banana Mystic Potion ball python!
